hints.MIRROR_FALLBACK: Static mirror used; upstream unavailable or disabled.
hints.NO_DATA: No data available; check upstream source or mirror freshness.
hints.BINDING_MISSING: KV binding RV_KV missing in this environment.
hints.ROUTING_HTML: Route served HTML; verify Pages routing and middleware gating.
hints.PROVIDER_TIMEOUT: Upstream timed out; retry with backoff or reduce fanout.
hints.PROVIDER_429_RATE_LIMIT: Rate limited; reduce cadence or fanout.
hints.RATE_LIMITED: Rate limited; wait for cooldown or reduce cadence.
hints.TIMEOUT: Provider timed out; reduce fanout or retry later.
hints.CIRCUIT_OPEN: Circuit open; wait for cooldown window.
hints.PROVIDER_BAD_PAYLOAD: Provider response was not valid JSON or CSV.
hints.PROVIDER_SCHEMA_MISMATCH: Provider JSON schema changed; inspect payload.
hints.BUDGET_EXCEEDED: Daily budget exceeded; reduce requests or disable block.
hints.BUDGET_EXHAUSTED: Daily budget exhausted; reduce requests or fanout.
hints.MISSING_SECRET: Provider secret missing; set required key and rerun seeder.
hints.DATAAT_OUTDATED: dataAt is outdated; check source ordering or provider payload.
hints.POISON_GUARD: Write blocked to protect last-good snapshot.
hints.DEGRADED_COVERAGE: Partial snapshot written with reduced coverage.
hints.PARTIAL: Partial snapshot written; check coverage thresholds.
